member.name: DXGI_DISPLAY_COLOR_SPACE
member.summary: Don't use this structure; it is not supported and it will be removed from the header in a future release.

member.name: DXGI_DISPLAY_COLOR_SPACE.PrimaryCoordinates
member.summary: The primary coordinates, as an 8 by 2 array of FLOAT values.

member.name: DXGI_DISPLAY_COLOR_SPACE.WhitePoints
member.summary: The white points, as a 16 by 2 array of FLOAT values.
